title: cartelle non lette
content: 'restano visive le cartelle che si leggono mentre una volta dopo un certo tempo sparivano e rimanevano le cartelle in grassetto c'è la possibilita di aggiornare manualmente le cartelle non lette (o potete farlo automaticamente all'arrivo o scaricamento delle mail) grazie

title: e-mail mentése
content:
Tisztelt Cím! Be tudom valahol állítani, hogy a Thunderbird bejövő e-mail-jeinek mentésekor címnek csak a levél tárgyát ajánlja fel? (Sajnos kb. fél éve a tárgy mögé teszi a feladó nevét -emial-címét, dátumot és még egy belső futó sorszámot is! pl. Az "egyenleg értesítő" tárgyú levélnél: Egyenleg értesítő - EazyFuel Alerts (eazyfuel-alerts@normbenz.hu) - 2023-10-27 0902.eml

Már több szoftveres szakembert kérdeztem, nem találtak beállítási módot! Köszönöm! Demjén Éva
creator: titkarsag2

title: Problematica salvataggio mail inviata in posta inviata
content:
Buongiorno, alcuni dei nostri clienti stanno avendo problemi con la procedura succitata: quando inviano della posta il salvataggio in Posta Inviata non avviene, ma viene anzi mostrato a schermo un messaggio di errore che chiede il salvataggio manuale della mail. Questo problema si è presentato ieri su alcune nostre mail soltanto su Thunderbird. Potreste fornirci assistenza?

Cordiali saluti
creator: support208

title: Deleted dates in the calendar
content: Hello, since the last update of thunderbird deleted dates reapear after restart. I could not find any help for this in the knowledge base. I do not have any other calendars and don't synchronise with any other systems. Thunderbird 115.4.1 (64-Bit) Windows 11 Kind Regards -Klaus-

title: I really love the new thunderbird 115. Any update on the iOS app?

I have thunderbird everywhere, including all of my work computers, but I don’t have it the one device that I am always on and that is iOS.

title: unable to send email after update to 115 10/2023
content:
Suddenly unable to download emails, tried to go back to earlier version but that didn't work.

Deleted all Thunderbird files from hard drive, reloaded new Thunderbird, but now I'm unable to set up with Spectrum because the password is wrong!!!

Using the same password for years.

Now I have no access to email at all because it won't allow me to set up with server.

Spectrum / Hawaii Island

Paul
creator: bigislndboy

title: Emails
content: Prior to the new Supernova version of Thunderbird being launched, I had opened a number of emails and left them open. Now when I return to them they are blank. I can read newly opened emails that I left open, but not the old ones. Is there any way I can read the emails that I had left open prior to Supernova?
creator: rumiandme153

title: Why does Thunderbird "misidentify" Forum Senders when redo profile email account?
content:
I recently created a new profile for thunderbird. I have had multiple problems with this new version 115.3.1 (32-bit). Very frustrated.

I am using a gmail account and thunderbird as client. When I recreated IMAP account to new profile, it makes EVERY correspondent the same person. I use the account for forum emails from an organization where like professionals share information and it is private. The new profile takes the name of one member and puts that in all prior emails, rather then having the correct sender name. I had no problem with my prior profile and cant figure out why Thunderbird is doing this?? I a different email account it did the same thing with a different organization and it put same correspondent name on most, but not all group emails.

I am guessing its how thunderbird is reading the message source code. Shouldn't it be taking it from the "FROM" tag in it.

I appreciate any suggestions or comments. I still have my old profile and can use that with no problem. Also gmail online email stuff is fine, so it has to be Thunderbird that is deciding to input one correspondent's name for forum email. I don't understand why or how to fix.

Thank you

Matthew
creator: MSKHawaii
